meanings.definition: Zydecos: a style of music originating in Louisiana that combines elements of Cajun music and blues
meanings.sent1: The zydecos played lively music at the festival.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to zydecos on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The zydecos had the whole crowd dancing with their upbeat tunes.
meanings.sent4: The zydecos' music was a melting pot of different musical traditions.
meanings.sent5: The zydecos' performance was a fusion of Cajun and blues sounds.

meanings.definition: Zydecos: a plural noun referring to a group of musicians who play zydeco music
meanings.sent1: The zydecos were setting up their instruments on stage.
meanings.sent2: We could hear the zydecos tuning their instruments backstage.
meanings.sent3: The zydecos joked around as they prepared for their gig.
meanings.sent4: The zydecos harmonized perfectly during their performance.
meanings.sent5: The zydecos' passion for zydeco music was evident in every note they played.
